Name: Dire Claw
Effect: Single Target. High Critical. Roll 2 Chance dice to Poison the Target. Roll 2 Chance dice to Paralyze the Target. Roll 2 Chance dice to put the Target to Sleep.
Description: To hunt, this Pokemon makes a small gash on their victim's skin, retreating afterwards. Patiently stalking their victim, waiting for the toxins infused by their claws to wear them out.
